title: Set Up Brand Safety Filters
description: A brand manager wants to ensure their display ads do not appear on websites with sensitive or inappropriate content.

tasks.description: Navigate to the brand safety settings in the display advertising platform.
Create a placement exclusion list of specific websites to block.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uploads a list of known inappropriate sites.

tasks.description: Apply content category exclusions to block ads from appearing alongside sensitive topics (e.g., 'Tragedy and Conflict').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects the appropriate content categories to exclude.
